alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead and Western Madison below 6000ft; Gallatin Valley; Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains; Madison River Valley; Northwest Beaverhead County; Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued August 20 at 3:28AM MDT until August 22 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING THROUGH LATE MONDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...South winds 35 to 45 mph, with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...The Mountains of Southwestern Montana south of Interstate 90, The Madison and Beaverhead River Valleys, and Gallatin Valley. * WHEN...From Monday morning through late Monday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates.

area.areaDesc: Beaverhead and Western Madison below 6000ft; Gallatin Valley; Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains; Madison River Valley; Northwest Beaverhead County; Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains
